00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviQString.h"
00029 #include "KviTimeUtils.h"
00030 
00031 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionUserInfo
00032 {
00033         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00034         friend class KviServerParser;
00035         friend class KviConsole;
00036 protected:
00037         KviIrcConnectionUserInfo();
00038         ~KviIrcConnectionUserInfo(){};
00039 private:
00040         QString    m_szRealName;          // the actual real name sent from the server
00041         QString    m_szNickName;          // the actual nick name acknowledged by the server
00042         QString    m_szPassword;          // the password used connecting to the server
00043         QString    m_szUserMode;          // the actual user mode
00044         QString    m_szUserName;          // user name with ident char
00045         QString    m_szLocalHostIp;       // the local host ip as found by resolveLocalHost() at connection startup
00046         QString    m_szHostName;          // the local host name that the server reports
00047         QString    m_szHostIp;            // the host name above resolved, if possible
00048         QString    m_szAwayReason;
00049         bool       m_bAway;               // is the user away ?
00050         kvi_time_t m_tAway;               // time at that the user went away
00051         QString    m_szNickBeforeAway;    // the nickname that the user had just before going away
00052         // From bugtrack:
00053         // On many IRC networks the host is masked or hashed, and if one also is connected through a LAN,
00054         // it is basically impossible to initiate DCC transfers, as 192.168.0.13 or similar will be sent as IP.
00055         // But IRC servers usually (at least in my experience) send the unmasked host in the 001 raw event
00056         // with something like ":Welcome to the Internet Relay Chat network, nick!ident@host". I think
00057         // it'd be a good idea to just grab the IP from that event and use it for DCC transfers by default.
00058         QString    m_szUnmaskedHostName;
00059 public:
00060         const QString & realName(){ return m_szRealName; };
00061         const QString & nickName(){ return m_szNickName; };
00062         const QString & userMode(){ return m_szUserMode; };
00063         const QString & userName(){ return m_szUserName; };
00064         const QString & password(){ return m_szPassword; };
00065         const QString & localHostIp(){ return m_szLocalHostIp; };
00066         const QString & hostName(){ return m_szHostName; };
00067         const QString & unmaskedHostName(){ return m_szUnmaskedHostName; };
00068         const QString & hostIp(){ return m_szHostIp; };
00069         const QString & awayReason() { return m_szAwayReason; };
00070         bool hasUserMode(const QChar & m);
00071         bool isAway(){ return m_bAway; };
00072         time_t awayTime(){ return m_tAway; };
00073         const QString & nickNameBeforeAway(){ return m_szNickBeforeAway; };
00074 protected:
00075         void setRealName(const QString &szRealName){ m_szRealName = szRealName; };
00076         void setNickName(const QString &szNickName){ m_szNickName = szNickName; };
00077         void setUserMode(const QString &szUserMode){ m_szUserMode = szUserMode; };
00078         void setUserName(const QString &szUserName){ m_szUserName = szUserName; };
00079         void setPassword(const QString &szPassword){ m_szPassword = szPassword; };
00080         void setHostName(const QString &szHostName){ m_szHostName = szHostName; };
00081         void setUnmaskedHostName(const QString &szHostName){ m_szUnmaskedHostName = szHostName; };
00082         void setHostIp(const QString &szHostIp){ m_szHostIp = szHostIp; };
00083         void setLocalHostIp(const QString &szLocalHostIp){ m_szLocalHostIp = szLocalHostIp; };
00084         bool addUserMode(const QChar &m); // returns false if the mode was already there
00085         bool removeUserMode(const QChar &m); // returns fales if the mode was not there
00086         void setAwayReason(const QString& szReazon) { m_szAwayReason=szReazon; };
00087         void setAway();
00088         void setBack();
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif //!_KVI_IRCCONNECTIONUSERINFO_H_
